metadata.synopsis: Obelia Toobin shouts a line to draw the player's attention to her.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Plays automatically after the beastmaster exits the submersible.

0.speaker: Obelia Toobin
0.text: Hey! Please, over here. I've something to ask.

1.speaker: Obelia Toobin
1.text: Our saviour! Please, I want to ask you something.
